E tu motherboard?
Infect your database

No path is open to your thought
Denied my call
Our server’s open
Host your mind on the Kingdom Cloud

You’re through
I’m telling you
Can’t take it unless you buy our firewall

Hold on, support is near
Won’t show how to phish
Have injection instead
Restore your memory
With kit from the box

I’ll bring the medicine
If you show me the logs
It’ll be a walk in the park
Re-solder neurons

Once they’re in
Accept them
Don’t reject all your new components
Rewired your brain

Now every pool of regret is the same
Old game that you play
Bought freely till nothing but malware remained

You won’t feel any pain on the Kingdom Cloud
You won’t see any harm with the Kingdom Cloud

Everyone has a code
Some write them
Others they follow a worm
